H0.text: We can pick the longest magnet is the idea shared by four students who tried to find out which magnet was the strongest, demonstrating scientific thinking.

H1.text: We can pick the heaviest magnet is the idea that shows scientific thinking for the four students who tried to find out which magnet was the strongest, each sharing one idea.

H2.text: We can measure the strength of the magnets is the idea that shows scientific thinking for four students who tried to find out which magnet was the strongest.

H3.text: We can vote for the magnet that we think is the strongest is the idea that shows scientific thinking for four students who tried to determine which magnet was the strongest and each shared one idea.

A4.text: Measurement is the quantification of attributes of an object or event, which can be used to compare with other objects or events.
